evergreen.description: Always growing, always green, and always calm, evergreen nodes are slowly updated over time.

archived.description: Once legendary, for one reason or another these nodes fell from fame. For historic reasons, I keep em around, but heed my advice and never use it as information, even if your life depends on it!

unstable.description: Updating at the speed of light, blink once and a word could be gone! These nodes are eratic, unstable, dangerous, but that's why they are fun.

sunset.description: All good things must come to an end, but that's a good thing. The end of a day means the start of a new one. Sunset posts were once evergreens, now ready to give life for new pages

seed.description: Still young, while seeds don't look like anything much, they have the power to grow into something beautiful if kindled and given room to florish.

blog.description: A fleshed out story, one you just might want to read.

journal.description: From the heart bleeds tales of longing, tales of suffering, and most importantly, tales of hope. From my little sacturary to yours.

garden.description: A network of color and charecter, one node alone is nothing, but together beutiful.
